member.summary: Creates URL of the dialog which allows user to choose which personas should be assigned to or removed from documents. Stores additional parameters to the session (via WindowHelper) as well.
member.param: Tag/Untag documents
All documents according to filter values or only selected ones
Specifies NodeIDs which should be tagged/untagged if only selected documents are chosen in parameter
Additional parameters allowing to filter documents when 'All document' scope is selected
member.exception: is set to 'selected documents' and is null or empty
member.returns: URL of the dialog which should be opened to finish action
